survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate On-Site Childcare Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction and needs related to the on-site childcare services provided by the company, to better understand how these services can be improved.

questions.question_text: Have you used the company's on-site childcare services in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use this question to filter respondents who have used the service versus those who haven't.

script.question_text: Have you used the company's on-site childcare services in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facility?
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facility?
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What aspects of the on-site childcare services do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice to allow selection of multiple benefits.

script.question_text: What aspects of the on-site childcare services do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: If the on-site childcare services were not available, how would it impact your work-life balance?
questions.client_notes: Use this question to understand the perceived importance of the service.

script.question_text: If the on-site childcare services were not available, how would it impact your work-life balance?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare services?
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare services?
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 answer is 'Yes'.
